translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The Dhamma Paccanīyānuloma, Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.5. Kusalattika, Vitakkattika🔽Nakusalaṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.🔽Nakusalaṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika vitakkattika  na kusalam na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava  na kusalam na avitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ avitakka vicāra mattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
translated: .. The wholesome triad, the applied thought triad

original: Nakusalaṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dvādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate dvādasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na avitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ avitakka avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā dvādasa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate dvādasa
translated: With the wholesome, not-having-applied-thought-and-not-having-sustained-thought, states as condition there arises the unwholesome, having-applied-thought-and-having-sustained-thought, states, by way of root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause nine … With result three … With object three … With distance nine … With proximity nine … With disappearance nine … With arising nine … With presence nine … With non-disappearance nine … With past nine … With future nine … With present nine … With past and future nine … With past and present nine … With future and present nine … With past, future and present nine … With internal nine … With external nine … With internal and external nine … With not-internal-not-external nine … With ignoble-person nine … With noble-person nine … With ignoble-person-and-noble-person nine … With not-ignoble-person-not-noble-person nine … With kamma nine … With kamma-result nine … With kamma and kamma-result nine … With not-kamma-not-kamma-result nine … With nutriment nine … With not-nutriment nine … With nutriment and not-nutriment nine … With not-nutriment-not-nutriment nine … With faculty nine … With not-faculty nine … With faculty and not-faculty nine … With not-faculty-not-faculty nine … With great nine … With not-great nine … With great and not-great nine … With not-great-not-great nine … With aggregates nine … With bases nine … With elements nine … With dependent origination nine … With faculties nine … With truths nine … With path nine … With not-path nine … With path and not-path nine … With not-path-not-path nine … With aggregates, bases and elements nine … With aggregates, elements and dependent origination nine … With aggregates, elements and faculties nine … With aggregates, elements, dependent origination and faculties nine … With aggregates, bases, elements and dependent origination nine … With aggregates, bases, elements, dependent origination and faculties nine … With aggregates, bases, elements, dependent origination, faculties and truths nine … With aggregates, bases, elements, dependent
